text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pct/CodeSystem/PCTDiagnosisType defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
patientReasonForVisit Patient's Reason for VisitIdentifies the patient's reason for the outpatient institutional visit
other OtherRequired when other conditions coexist or develop subsequently during the treatment

name: PCTDiagnosisType
title: PCT Diagnosis Type
publisher: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

description: Defining codes for the classification of diagnosis types

concept.definition: Identifies the patient's reason for the outpatient institutional visit
Required when other conditions coexist or develop subsequently during the treatment
